text: aur ai meree qaum apane paravaradigaar se magaphirat kee dua mogon phir usakee baaragaah mein apane (gunaahon se) tauba karo to vah tum par moosalaadhaar meh aasamaan se barasaega khushk saalee na hogee aur tumhaaree qoovat (taaqat) mein aur qoovat badha dega aur mujarim ban kar usase munh na modon
